site_intro: I'm a full stack engineer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional web applications. I have experience with a variety of technologies and am always looking to learn more.

site_meta.description: Vanessa Coles is a full stack engineer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional web applications. She has experience with a variety of technologies and is always looking to learn more.
